descriptionHtml:
When you speak the the girl Varrina in the Amber Creek Inn, she gives you a recipe and then asks you to bring it back to her and she will give you additional recipes.   However, the check condition in Falskaar checks her inventory, not the players.  This patch fixes that, so you can proceed and get all her new recipes.

If you have the latest version of my mod Falskaar Home Improvement, this mod is not needed as the patch is include in Home Improvement
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/38427

Please endorse if you like!

Credits to Alexander J Velicky for his excellent Falskaar Mod (DLC really!)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/37994
author: rsck3405
